Hi all,

needing to pay for some mantis items so I put together
a sales page.  It is rare that I have anything
non-mantis, but I had to buy a bunch of things for a
mantis tsuba.  Appreciate any feedback or ask
questions.

http://www.freewebs.com/kamakiriken/salepage.htm

Thanks for looking
Ken aka "the Mantis Dude"
